org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.name: HTS Client Intake
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.description: Datasets from the HTS Client Intake Form
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.sqlQuery:
SELECT gp1.property_value as IP, nigeria_datimcode_mapping.state_name as `Facility State`, nigeria_datimcode_mapping.lga_name as `Facility LGA`, gp3.property_value as `Facility`, gp2.property_value as `DATIM Code`, person_address.state_province as `Client State`, person_address.city_village as `Client LGA`, pid1.identifier as HTSClientCode, pid2.identifier as PepfarID, pid3.identifier as HospID, pid4.identifier as RecencyID, person.gender as Sex, DATE_FORMAT(person.birthdate,'%d-%b-%Y') as `Date Of Birth`, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,curdate()) as CurrentAge,
CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,curdate()) < 1 THEN '<1' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,curdate()) BETWEEN 1 AND 4 THEN '1 - 4' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,curdate()) BETWEEN 5 AND 9 THEN '5 - 9' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,curdate()) BETWEEN 10 AND 14 THEN '10 - 14' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,curdate()) BETWEEN 15 AND 19 THEN '15 - 19' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,curdate()) BETWEEN 20 AND 24 THEN '20 - 24' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,curdate()) BETWEEN 25 AND 29 THEN '25 - 29' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,curdate()) BETWEEN 30 AND 34 THEN '30 - 34' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,curdate()) BETWEEN 35 AND 39 THEN '35 - 39' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,curdate()) BETWEEN 40 AND 44 THEN '40 - 44' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,curdate()) BETWEEN 45 AND 49 THEN '45 - 49' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,curdate()) > 49 THEN '50+'
END AS `Age Group`,
TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,enc.encounter_datetime) as AgeAtVisit, DATE_FORMAT(enc.encounter_datetime,'%d-%b-%Y') as VisitDate, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165839,cn1.name, NULL)) as `Setting`, visit.visit_id as VisitID, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=166136,cn1.name, NULL)) as `KindOfHTS`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165966,obs.value_text, NULL)) as `SettingOthersSpecify`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id= 165790,cn1.name, NULL)) as `FirstTimeVisit`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id= 165793,cn1.name, NULL)) as `TypeOfSession`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id= 165480,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ReferredFrom`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id= 1054,cn1.name, NULL)) as `MaritalStatus`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id= 160312,obs.value_numeric, NULL)) as `NoOfOwnChildrenLessThan5`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=5557,obs.value_numeric, NULL)) as `NoOfWives`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165794,cn1.name, NULL)) as `IsClientIdentifiedFromAnindexClient`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id= 165798,cn1.name, NULL)) as IndexType, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165859,obs.value_text, NULL)) as IndexClientID, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165976,cn1.name, NULL)) as `IsClientRetestingForResultVerification`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165799,cn1.name, NULL)) as `PreviouslyTestedHIVNegative`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=1434,IF(obs.value_coded is not null,IF(obs.value_coded=1,"Yes","No"),""), NULL)) as `ClientPregnant`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id= 165801,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ClientInformedAboutHIVTransmissionRoutes`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id= 165802,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ClientInformedAboutRiskFactorsForHIVTransmission`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id= 165804,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ClientInformedOnPreventingHIVTransmissionMethods`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id= 165884,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ClientInformedAboutPossibleTestResults`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id= 1710,IF(obs.value_coded is not null,IF(obs.value_coded=1,"Yes","No"),""), NULL)) as `InformedConsentForHivTestingGiven`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165800,cn1.name, NULL)) as `EverHadSexualIntercourse`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=1063,IF(obs.value_coded is not null,IF(obs.value_coded=1,"Yes","No"),""), NULL)) as `BloodTransfusioninLast3Months`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=159218,cn1.name, NULL)) as `UnprotectedSexWithCasualPartnerinLast3Months`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165803,cn1.name, NULL)) as `UnprotectedSexWithRegularPartnerInTheLast3Months`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=164809,cn1.name, NULL)) as `STIinLast3Months`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165806,cn1.name, NULL)) as `MoreThan1SexPartnerDuringLast3Months`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=143264,cn1.name, NULL)) as `CurrentCough`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=832,IF(obs.value_coded is not null,IF(obs.value_coded=1,"Yes","No"),""), NULL)) as `WeightLoss`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=140238,cn1.name, NULL)) as `Fever`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=133027,IF(obs.value_coded is not null,IF(obs.value_coded=1,"Yes","No"),""), NULL)) as `NightSweats`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=124068,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ContactWithTBPatient`,
count( CASE WHEN obs.concept_id in (832,143264,140238,133027,124068) AND obs.value_coded in (1,1065) THEN 1 END) as `TBScreeningScore`,
MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165809,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ComplaintsofVaginalDischargeorBurningWhenUrinating`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165810,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ComplaintsofLowerAbdominalPainsWithorWithoutVaginalDischarge`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165813,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ComplaintsofGenitalSoreOrSwollenInguinalLymphNodesWithorWithoutPains`,
count( CASE WHEN obs.concept_id in (165809,165810,165813) AND obs.value_coded =1065 THEN 1 END) as `STIScreeningScore`,
count( CASE WHEN obs.concept_id in (165800,1063,159218,165803,164809,165806) AND obs.value_coded in (1,1065) THEN 1 END) as `RiskAssesmentScore`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165840,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ScreeningTestResult`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165844,obs.value_datetime, NULL)) as `ScreeningTestDate`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165841,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ConfirmatoryTestResult`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165845,obs.value_datetime, NULL)) as `ConfirmatoryTestDate`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165842,cn1.name, NULL)) as `TieBreaker`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165846,obs.value_datetime, NULL)) as `TieBreakerDate`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165843,cn1.name, NULL)) as `FinalResult`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id= 165805,IF(obs.value_coded is not null,IF(obs.value_coded=1066,"No","Yes"),""), NULL)) as `OPT Out of RTRI`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=166216,cn1.name, NULL)) as `Recency Test Name`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165850,obs.value_datetime, NULL)) as `Recency Test Date`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=166212,cn1.name, NULL)) as `Control Line`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=166243,cn1.name, NULL)) as `Verification Line`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=166211,cn1.name, NULL)) as `Longterm Line`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=166213,cn1.name, NULL)) as `Recency Interpretation`,
MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=166244,cn1.name, NULL)) as `HasViralLoadBeenRequested`,
MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=159951,obs.value_datetime, NULL)) as `Date Sample Collected`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165988,obs.value_datetime, NULL)) as `Date Sample Sent`, getnumericvalueobsid(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,856,10,:endDate)) as `Viral Load Result`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=166241,cn1.name, NULL)) as `Viral Load Result Classification`, DATE_FORMAT(getobsdatetime(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,856,10,:endDate)),'%d-%b-%Y') as `Date Of Viral Load Result`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=166233,cn1.name, NULL)) as `PCR Lab`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=166214,cn1.name, NULL)) as `Final Recency Result`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165881,cn1.name, NULL)) as `HaveYouBeenTestedforHivBeforeWithinThisYear`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165818,cn1.name, NULL)) as `HIVRequestandResultFormSignedbyTester`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=164848,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ClientReceivedHIVTestResult`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=159382,cn1.name, NULL)) as `PostTestCounselingDone`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165883,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ClientUseFPMethodsOtherThanCondom`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=5571,IF(obs.value_coded is not null,IF(obs.value_coded=1,"Yes","No"),""), NULL)) as ClientUseCondomsAsFPMethod, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=299,cn1.name, NULL)) as SyphilisTestResult, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=159430,cn1.name, NULL)) as HepatitisBVirusTestResult, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=161471,cn1.name, NULL)) as HepatitisCVirusTestResult, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=1648,IF(obs.value_coded is not null,IF(obs.value_coded=1,"Yes","No"),""), NULL)) as ClientReferredtoOtherServices, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165820,cn1.name, NULL)) as RiskReductionPlanDeveloped, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165821,cn1.name, NULL)) as PostTestDisclosurePlanDeveloped, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165822,cn1.name, NULL)) as WillBringPartnerForHivTesting, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165823,cn1.name, NULL)) as WillBringOwnChildrenLessThan5YearsforHIVTesting, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=1382,cn1.name, NULL)) as ProvidedWithInformationonFPandDualContraception, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=1382,cn1.name, NULL)) as CorrectCondomUseDemonstrated, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=159777,cn1.name, NULL)) as CondomsProvidedToClient, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=166284,IF(obs.value_coded is not null,IF(obs.value_coded=1,"Yes","No"),""), NULL)) as KeyPopulation, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=166369,cn1.name, NULL)) as KPType, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165045,obs.value_text, NULL)) as AdditionalComments, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=166242,DATE_FORMAT(obs.value_datetime,'%d-%b-%Y'), NULL)) as SignatureDate FROM obs LEFT JOIN patient ON(patient.patient_id=obs.person_id and obs.voided=0 and patient.voided=0) LEFT JOIN person on(patient.patient_id=person.person_id and person.voided=0) LEFT join encounter enc on(enc.encounter_id=obs.encounter_id and enc.voided=0 and obs.voided=0 and enc.form_id IN (10,75)) LEFT JOIN visit on (enc.visit_id=visit.visit_id and visit.voided=0) left join concept_name cn1 on(obs.value_coded=cn1.concept_id and cn1.locale='en' and cn1.locale_preferred=1) LEFT JOIN person_address on (obs.person_id=person_address.person_id and person_address.voided=0) LEFT JOIN patient_identifier pid1 on(pid1.patient_id=patient.patient_id and patient.voided=0 and pid1.identifier_type=8 and pid1.voided=0) LEFT JOIN patient_identifier pid2 on(pid2.patient_id=patient.patient_id and patient.voided=0 and pid2.identifier_type=4 and pid2.voided=0) LEFT JOIN patient_identifier pid3 on(pid3.patient_id=patient.patient_id and patient.voided=0 and pid3.identifier_type=5 and pid3.voided=0) LEFT JOIN patient_identifier pid4 on(pid4.patient_id=patient.patient_id and patient.voided=0 and pid4.identifier_type=10 and pid4.voided=0) LEFT JOIN global_property gp1 on(gp1.property='partner_short_name') LEFT JOIN global_property gp2 on(gp2.property='facility_datim_code') LEFT JOIN global_property gp3 on(gp3.property='Facility_Name') LEFT JOIN nigeria_datimcode_mapping on(gp2.property_value=nigeria_datimcode_mapping.datim_code) WHERE patient.voided=0 and enc.voided=0 and enc.encounter_datetime BETWEEN :startDate and :endDate GROUP BY patient.patient_id;
